data.title: Providing liquidity alternatives in direct private equity
data.meta_description: Providing liquidity alternatives in direct private equity
data.text:
We partner with many of the world’s leading private equity firms to spearhead GP-led transactions. Since W Capital began providing secondary liquidity to GPs more than two decades ago, GP-leds have become a high growth and broadly accepted strategy. GP-leds may allow GPs’ to generate liquidity for their funds and limited partners while keeping control of assets and extending hold periods.

GP Continuation Funds

Recapitalizing a GPs investor base for specific targeted assets

GP Structured Solutions

Structuring solutions directly with a GP to address liquidity and ownership objectives

We invest in companies where we can offer liquidity to selected shareholders as a liquidity solution provider. We can work with the ongoing investors and management teams to support long term growth plans. By offering interim liquidity to investors, W Capital better aligns the shareholder base and enables management to continue executing on growth objectives.

Minority Recap

Offering a company supported liquidity solution to all shareholders

Direct Share Purchases

Providing shareholders partial or full liquidity for individual equity stakes
